attributes.action: Scrap the ill conceived Home Information Packs (H.I.P.S) Now!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Home Information Pack was originally conceived as a way of speeding up the sale of property.  The original plans were amended so much, that it is now of limited use, and only serves to further stall the already poor property market.  Why would somebody speculatively put their property on the market knowing that they will have to pay out in excess of £300 immediately, even if the house fails to sell?

rejection.details:
There are several petitions in existence already:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GetridofHIPs/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
